abstract: Senator Bernie Sanders, the Independent from Vermont, wrote a letter to the five F.C.C. commissioners, in which he denounces Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal.
snippet: Senator Bernie Sanders, the Independent from Vermont, wrote a letter to the five F.C.C. commissioners, in which he denounces Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: Comcast is expected to announce a new management lineup for NBC Universal as soon as Wednesday, in anticipation of completing its takeover of the company by the end of the year or early next year.

headline.main: Sanders Tells Regulators to Block Comcast-NBC Deal

abstract: Comcast, in response to a letter from Senator Bernie Sanders, the Independent from Vermont, said Tuesday that its merger with NBC Universal has wide support among both local and federal legislators, despite the opposition of some consumer-advocacy groups.
snippet: Comcast, in response to a letter from Senator Bernie Sanders, the Independent from Vermont, said Tuesday that its merger with NBC Universal has wide support among both local and federal legislators, despite the opposition of some consumer-advocacy...
lead_paragraph: Comcast released a statement Tuesday in response to a letter that Senator Bernie Sanders,  Independent of Vermont, sent to the Federal Communications Commission seeking to block the upcoming takeover of NBC Universal by Comcast.

headline.main: Comcast Defends Merger in Response to Sanders
